clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Investigated for the treatment of depression

incompatibilities.description: The risk or severity of adverse effects can be increased when Tranylcypromine is combined with Aptazapine
The risk or severity of adverse effects can be increased when Phenelzine is combined with Aptazapine
The risk or severity of adverse effects can be increased when Selegiline is combined with Aptazapine
